description: Number of prime divisors of 2^n + 1 (counted with multiplicity).
comments: The length of row n in A001269.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., Main Tables from the Cunningham Project.
mathematica: a[q_] := Module[{x, n}, x=FactorInteger[2^n+1]; n=Length[x]; Sum[Table[x[i]][2]], {i, n}][j]], {j, n}]]A054992[n_Integer] := PrimeOmega[2^n + 1]; Table[A054992[n], {n,200}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 22 2011 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A046051 (number of prime factors of 2^n-1).
Cf. A086257 (number of primitive prime factors)
author: Arne Ring (arne.ring(AT)epost.de), May 30 2000
